thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 44 of 61
thread.title: Tanesha

author: Tanesha
title: Tanesha
text: I recently purchased some Givenchy slides (women) and they are fabulous & comfortable. My slides were delivered in 2 days after purchase. Customer service was wonderful when I contacted them about returning them for a smaller size. I wear an 8 but needed a 7 as they run a little big. She cancelled my order, refunded my money within 2 days and I purchased my smaller size. They are super cute and can't wait to wear them on my birthday trip to Thailand. I'll be purchasing from here more often.
